channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [TIKA-2488] Outlook PST Parser fails from NullPointerException
item.description:
Getting this error when trying to parse PST file.
commands used:
java -jar tika-server-1.16.jar
curl -T test.pst http://127.0.0.1:9998/tika --header "Accept: text/plain"

item.summary: Outlook PST Parser fails from NullPointerException

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.

comments.comment: Would you be able to attach a small sample PST file showing the problem to this JIRA ticket, so we can try to reproduce?
Pretty small pst compared to the one I'm actually trying to parse. But still reproduces the error.

Thank you for opening this and sharing a triggering file. I'm not able to reproduce this with tika-app 1.16 or 1.17-SNAPSHOT, and I'm not able to reproduce this with 1.17-SNAPSHOT's server...will try tika-1.16 server shortly.

If you try tika-app-1.16.jar on the file, do you get the same exception?

Also, do you have any content in that pst?

Hi Tim,

Thanks for getting back to me. There is no content in that PST file. Unfortunately I do no have a dummy pst file big enough to really reproduce what I'm seeing from the error. But it bascially combs through the first part of the top of the information store for the PST file but then gets that error and fails to parse the rest of the data.

Here is my output from the tika-app-1.16

Apache Tika was unable to parse the document
